channel.title: [PI] need help... adding shops
channel.description:
Ehh... I keep having problems im sorry i keep posting threads how to fix stuff but i cant find a tutorial that helps me find what im wanting to do and PI is different than other servers i use to run...
What i am wanting to do is: I am wanting to make a new home And im trying to move the NPC's You know? The shops, although i dont kno where to go.. If you can explain to me how to Set Npc coords also sell other items and how to set the price.. thanks guys you help me alot ty ty ty ty ty

item.title: [PI] need help... adding shops
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

spawn-config - edit the location of NPCs
shops.cfg - edit the item and amount of the item in the shops
item.cfg - edit the price of the item

Read full topic
